list.description:
Long Range artillery gunsight pack V2

This Sightpack is fully made by me using the amazing sight creation software by Smiley_4_1 after my 1st version that was based on someone elses sight.
link to editor (which is constantly updated)
https://www.reddit.com/r/Warthunder/comments/919737/i_made_a_custom_tank_sight_editor/

The rangescale is self adjusting for the current selected ammo type, have a grid of 1 mil large squares for ranging and a clean sight picture, so observing impacts is relatively easy.
They are perfect if you want to have accurate shooting at LONG ranges with your derpguns.

ve

OUTDATED VERSION!

Long Range artillery gunsight pack

This sight pack is based of a sight made by @Nirrti https://live.warthunder.com/post/750378/en/
I expanded on it and added range lines past 3km to a max distance of 10km (only some sights work to that range)

These sights are perfect if you want to have accurate shooting at LONG ranges with your derpguns.

vehicles included in the sight pack are:


  • Lorraine 155
  • Dicker Max
  • Sturmpanzer II
  • Brummbär
  • VFW
  • Flakbus
  • Ho Ni I
  • Ho ni III
  • Ho Ro
  • Type 75 SPH
  • FV4005
  • M3 75mm GMC
  • M56
  • T30
  • ISU-152
  • OBJ-120
  • OBJ 268
  • SU-5-1
  • SU-76M
  • SU-152

#lor

Universal sight for all modern tanks.Depending on a zoom in tank it may require adjusting size of numbers(second pic).
#universal

Leopard 2K sight for Simulator battles

Diagonal line countering parallax. RB compatible


  • Includes default ballistic block (up to 4000 m);
  • Includes diagonal line in accordance to offset of optics to the gun barrel;
  • Includes vertical range notches for use with diagonal line and sight distance control;
  • Includes static rangefinder (from 250 m to 2500 m);

Suitable for both DM12 (HEATFS) and DM13 (APFSDS) shells.

To correctly shoot in SB (or with "view from gunner sights" mode) you must use sight distance control. Shell hit point is where diagonal line crosses the vertical line. Check pictu

MOSTLY OUTDATED

I'm also disabling the comments since I'm really not coming back to updating them, if you want to download something that actually works then check for example sights made by Rastmust
https://live.warthunder.com/user/107154207/

glass sight for german 2.0cm flak cannons.

Visierkopf38/40

#wirbelwind #flakpanzer

If you want to use it on 3.7cm flak cannons like the#ostwind then no one is stopping you.

version1 of the file as seen in the picture.
IF i manage to find better radii for circles i'll update the eclipse as the only way to make eclipses with these tools is to combine many circles.

Setting up custom sights

1)Take the vehicle for a Test Drive, then go to game settings → Main → main parameters.
2)In the heading “Use alternative sight grid”, select “Add a grid sight”.
3)In the UserSights folder in the game dir

Here's a Type 75 sight I cooked up, figured it could do a better sight than the default one, and this one goes up to 7km. Also has a stadiametric rangefinder up to 4km or so. Has range scales for both the default HE (and the distance fuse variant since it has the same muzzle vel), and the Type 75 higher velocity HE. Smoke shell has less muzzle velocity than the default HE (by about -17m/s) so it can sort of still be fired with the left range scale.

#Type_75_sph #type75sph

#type75sph

simple extended sight that can help with airbursting down helicopters.

slightly modified ranging sight from zRirez.
It could still use some fine tuning for ranges 1500 to 2900m. ill be working on that while i spade this.

Setting up custom sights

1)Take the vehicle for a Test Drive, then go to game settings → Main → main parameters.
2)In the heading “Use alternative sight grid”, select “Add a grid sight”.
3)In the UserSights folder in the game directory, a folder will be created with the name of the selected vehicle and a BLK file (sight_1),
which is an example of a standard s

Here's a Type 89 sight I ended up making for myself since there weren't really any sights for it that I liked. Has all the standard stuff you'd expect from my sights, ranges for each shell type, and a stadiametric rangefinder. Although unusual to my sights, this sight has the crosshair itself remain stationary when zeroing it, but instead applied to the gun itself. Also has corners to show where the full zoom is.

#type89

Here's a bit more useful sight for the AUBL 74 HVG, I remade the one I released earlier since that was done rather quickly.

#aubl74 #aubl_74_hvg #aubl_74_60_70m

FIRE CONTROL SYSTEMS FOR THE M3 BRADLEY v1
#m3bradley #bradley #m3 #FCS @zRirez
ATTENTION: This is not my original gun sight design. All credit for the design goes to zRirez at https://live.warthunder.com/user/zRirez/ and the original post https://live.warthunder.com/post/782824/en/ .

Ever since zRirez came out with his BMP sight I wanted it for other infantry fighting vehicles. I made a veersion for the Begleitpanzer 57 which you can find here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/793092/en/ and now I've made a version for the M3 Bradley.

How to use:
Set mouse wheel multiplier in camera contro

Прицел от БМ-13Н «Катюша» для ZaiaZ7.

Установка:
-архив распаковать в папку WarThunder (... \WarThunder\UserSights\ussr_bm_13n.blk)
-запустить пробный выезд на "Катюше", затем Меню -> Настройки -> Общие боевые настройки -> Использовать альтернативную сетку прицела -> выбрать прицел.

ЗЫ Прицел создан на основе других вариантов ракетных прицелов с Лайва.

#customsight #sight #b13n #katjusha #rocket

Pack of sights for all tanks in game.

Sights for all tanks with 2+ guns and every possible simulator sights are included.
You can read about sights for simulator gamemode here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1034369/en/
And about realistic gamemode: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1071757/en/

Install: watch this video. If the game was running, restart it.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ruwJoUfVYpo

I JUST CHANGED TEXT, I DO NOT OWN THIS SIGHT.
(If you are offended, please let me know.)
Currently not perfect, it will continue to be updated.

中文 : 90式戰車的日文版本瞄具，改良自@BarteG98PL 的M1艾布蘭瞄具。
我只有更改文字而已，該瞄具並不屬於我。
目前翻譯得不是很好，還會持續更新。

PT-76b Reticle for mainly HEAT FS made for 4K Monitors it has built in MG zeros and 0 - 700 meter static ranging

(Top triangle is 20m, bottom 200)
(Top of first circle 300m, Middle 400m, Bottom 500m)
(Top of lower smaller circle 500m, Middle 600m, Bottom 700m)

Mg zeros start at 25m (largest) 50 - 75 - 100 - 150 - 200 - 250

Note - the static ranging circles for main cannon might not work on lower resolutions (Triangle and Mg will stay zeroed)
Hope You Enjoy :)
#russia #ussr #pt76b #acss

Simple sight for the AUBL/74 HVG

#simple #fictional #sight #aubl_74_hvg #aubl74_hvg #aubl74_60

Another AUBL/74 HVG sight !

There is five simple boxes meant to find the range of something that fit in, something about 3.25m wide or 2.4m tall
The sight only features markings for the APFSDS and the LMG (LMG rounds dissapear after 1500m btw)
The 60 and 30 indicators show a approximate and rough estimate of the lead for a shot at a relative speed of 60 and 30 kph at about 1000-1500m (It would be a shame to not profit of that stabiliser !)

Schindibee's fictional "AESHNA" Sight for AUBL/74 HVG

#customsight #sight #fictional #aubl74 #aubl74_hvg #operation_heat

This is a fully fictional sight for the "Operation HEAT" reward vehicle AUBL/74 HVG (Italian Premium).

The sight features quick-use features like main graduation, ranging funnel and deflection aiming aids for the APFSDS ammo and simple distance scales for the HE ammo and coaxial MG, as well as a stadiametric rangefinder for tanks with height 2.5m.

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder \War Thunder\.

2) Go to test Drive (reccommend

A rather utilitarian sight for the AUBL/74 HVG. Has range scales for both ammo types, and a stadiametric rangefinder.

#aubl_74_hvg

Hello everyone this is my first sight. It is made under Cromwell 1, made it for themselves decided to upload if someone need. As far as possible I will finish it.(so far it's only under the shot Mk projectile.5, but since this is not the final version I will finish it)
If anyone has any suggestions on sights to write suddenly I can.
I made it under the mouse wheel multiplier 52%
P. s I looked at the Mk8 projectile and everything is fine, you can use.

#sight #britishtanks #britain #british #cromwell #cromwell_mk1

English
I've been bored so I made this simple sight. It is adjustable, so can be used in any tank (I hope so). Feel free to let me know what you think of it and what would you like to change.

Русский
Мне было скучно, поэтому я сделал этт простой прицел. Он регулируется, поэтому его можно использовать в любом танке (я надеюсь на это). Не стесняйтесь, дайте мне знать, что вы об этом думаете и что бы вы хотели изменить.

#sight #simplesight #nonhistoical #adjustable

AUBL/74 Sight

Plus I don't think there's that much desire from people for me to make that sight. @Schindibee 's sight is already good so I don't see much reason for me to make another (unless people like my layout).
